verses.roman:
tāṅre dekhi, mahāprabhura kṛṣṇa-smṛti haila
premāveśe tāṅre mili' kahite lāgila

synonyms: tāṅre dekhi—seeing him; mahāprabhura—of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kṛṣṇa-smṛti—remembrance of Kṛṣṇa; haila—there was; prema-āveśe—in ecstatic love; tāṅre—him; mili'—meeting; kahite lāgila—began to say.
translation: Seeing the boy, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu immediately remembered Kṛṣṇa. Meeting the boy in ecstatic love, the Lord began to speak.
